word:
The course of action which before the conference might have been a necessity, is no longer necessary; for the Lord Himself interposed to set things in order. He has given His Holy Spirit. I am confident that He will set in order the matters that seem to be moving wrong.--Letter 54, 1901, pp. 1, 3, 4. (To "My Dear Son Edson," J. E. White, June, 1901.) 


                                 -206-
